title: IAA Tonight | Could Boston be Kevin Durant's Next Stop?
description: It has been about a month since Brooklyn Nets star Kevin Durant has requested a trade from the team, but there hasn't been any suitors to offer up a good enough deal to the Nets liking. The Celtics have emerged as a possible trade partner, which would include star G Jaylen Brown. How likely is it that this deal could get done? Should Boston even pursue Kevin Durant after reaching the finals last season. Also, we preview the Houston Texans season. Will Davis Mills prove to be the Texans QB of the future?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (LeSean McCoy, Ashley Nicole Moss, Chantel Tremitiere)
